snippet.title: Brilliance: Catch the light
snippet.description:
Brilliance: Catch the light - Get it now!

This is our particular game with lights and beams. You can solve logic problems with unique mechanism in a beautiful colourful environment in a cunning way. Embark on a challenging experience, even striving for perfection on your own, but you are free to use hints available on each levels.

AppStore:
https://apps.apple.com/app/brilliance-catch-the-light/id1615524500

Visit our website:
https://www.sprightlywolf.com

#brilliancegame
